author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: Community Growth DAO
description: Sustainable funding for community hubs is needed for growth however Project Catalyst funding is normally only for specific projects.
solution: Create a DAO which will provide sustained DAO Net funding to Community Hubs to drive adoption and awareness of Cardano and DAO Net.
experience: An experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, SPO operators, Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts.
